title: Courtyard by Marriott Brings Best Game Face To The Largest Gaming Conference In North America, PAX PrimeTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Courtyard by Marriott Brings Best Game Face To The Largest Gaming Conference In North America, PAX Prime Published on : Friday, August 28, 2015
Courtyard is once again on the road, this time stopping at PAX Prime, the largest gaming festival in North America, where fans can experience the latest games and meet gaming’s hottest stars. Bringing its A-game as the Official Hotel of PAX Prime,
the brand’s traveling mobile pod – Courtyard @ PAX Powerplay will offer attendees exclusive experiences they’ll never forget.
Courtyard will host an exclusive PAX launch party, to kick-off the nonstop gaming fun, filled with appearances by the industry’s best gamers, music, food and drinks — plus professional hand massages — in preparation for the long hard days of gaming ahead.
Throughout the convention Courtyard @ PAX Powerplay will pair gamers with top Twitch stars for exclusive live gaming experiences and hosts fan giveaways for its “Rare Replay” tournaments. The four days will also be filled with appearances from famous gamers like NFL All-Pros Earl Thomas and Bobby Wagner and actor/comedian Taran Kiliam (“Saturday Night Live”). Fans missing the action in person can watch Courtyard’s exclusive channel on Twitch which will be streaming live throughout the convention.
“We love hitting the road and participating at popular events like Pax Prime, the biggest gaming festival in the country” said Callette Nielsen, vice president and global brand manager, Courtyard. “Not only does it bring us closer to the passion points of our guests, but it allows us to socialize and have fun with the next generation travelers who love competition and success just as much as Courtyard.”
Courtyard @ PAX Powerplay is part of the “Courtyard @” series, the brand’s annual mobile road trip that extends its hospitality beyond the properties and connects with travelers by delivering fun and unique experiences at the year’s hottest cultural events. This year, Courtyard @ made stops at the NFL Draft, Warrior Dash and later this year will be going to New York Comic Con.
“There is no denying that PAX is one of the biggest gaming events of the year and is a great platform to reach gamers of all types. Courtyard is bringing exclusive access to the industry’s biggest influencers through the Courtyard@ PAX Powerplay,” said Lance Fensterman, ReedPOP
The Courtyard by Marriott brand features hotels with a refreshing environment that helps guests stay connected, productive and balanced while traveling. Intuitive services and design accommodate guests’ desire for choice and control and allow them to use the public space and guest rooms to meet all of their needs while on the road. With more than 1000 locations in 42 countries, Courtyard has more locations than any other Marriott International brand.
